text: I would say both 1 and 2, icons are easily recognisable. Paired with an abbreviation it would be great to use for the future and build upon... almost like how Adobe have done it!

<@UD5GXJW1M> saw you recently asked about the extension: It’s available on the chrome web store:
<https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/HubSpot-developer-extensi/gebemkdecnlgbcanplbgdpcffpdnfdfo>

If you have feedback on the extension by all means hit us up in this channel, and if you’d like to contribute we can always use the help.
I’ll test and see if both will fit without making it rediculous and work on getting it into the beta build of the extension.

Thank you everyone for your feedback on the tab titles.

*Beta testers,* I’ve pushed this update into the beta, if you don’t want to wait for chrome to update automatically, you can force the update by going to <chrome://extensions> toggle on developer mode, hit the update button and feel free to toggle developer mode back off. Enjoy and please post any feedback you have.

If you think you can find better emoji for different pages please do suggest them.
